page.title: 15FAVOURITE GAMES 1.
page.content: {Skipping.}If you want to play skipping 2 people have to hold the rope and turn it while one person jumps.If that person gets tangled then they are out so they have to hold the end and someone else jumps.There is a song that you can skip to:"I am in the kitchen,Doing a bit of stitching,In came the bogeyman,Then I ran out." At the end of the song you run out of the skipping. {Elastics.}What you do is you choose 2 people to be enders.Then there might be 2 people jumping toether.That is doubles partners.Sometimes you jump on your own.You have to jump on the elastic and then jump inbetween.Next you take one strand over,stand on the other,then jump,releasing the first strand.I like it very much.
